subject: Doping (Sports)
Running
Tests (Drug Use)
lead_paragraph: Even as Kenyan athletes again captured the men’s and women’s races at the New York marathon, Kenya had a nonfunctioning antidoping agency, according to World Anti-Doping Agency officials.
snippet: Even as Kenyan athletes again captured the men’s and women’s races at the New York marathon, Kenya had a nonfunctioning antidoping agency, according to World Anti-Doping Agency officials.
